title: A phytic acid-based CoMn bimetallic metal–organic aerogel (PA–CoMn-1 : x : 2 − x) as a modifier for electrochemical detection of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug 4-acetaminophenol
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24574-24584
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04012K, Paper

Huijun Guo, Yifei Qi, Guoxin Wang, Yue Zhang, Siqi Li, Boyu Tan
Metal phosphides and phosphate-based materials have received significant attention due to their high electrocatalytic activity, adjustable structure composition and stability.
